content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT 
    rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
)
WITH (
    RateJson NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS rate
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON (RateJson)
WITH (
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(50)
);
